item.title: Scribe - Purchase and manage licenses in-product
item.description: Scribe: Enterprise Purchase and manage licenses in-product Enterprise Org Admins can now purchase and manage licenses directly in product. The new billing page provides clear visibility into how licenses... September 24, 2025

item.title: Scribe - Translate guides into 10 languages
item.description: Scribe: Enterprise Viewing Sharing Translate guides into 10 languages Scribe now translates your guides in 10 high-demand languages — instantly. Instead of creating duplicate documents or relying on unproven... September 18, 2025

item.title: Scribe - Ensure only approved documentation is shared
item.description: Scribe: Enterprise Editing Ensure only approved documentation is shared Scribe’s new approval workflows guarantee that only reviewed and approved content goes live. This gives Team Admins stricter control over... September 15, 2025

item.title: Scribe - Preview your guide live as you capture on desktop
item.description: Scribe: Pro Pro Team Enterprise Capturing Preview your guide live as you capture on desktop Scribe now shows you a live preview of your guide while you’re capturing it in the Scribe desktop application. As you work, each screenshot and... January 12, 2026

item.title: Scribe - Customize click target shapes for clearer guides
item.description: Scribe: Pro Pro Team Enterprise Editing Customize click target shapes for clearer guides Scribe now lets you change the shape of click targets, so highlights match the buttons, fields, and menus on screen. Instead of always using a... January 12, 2026

item.title: Scribe - Add tables within Pages
item.description: Scribe: Pro Pro Team Enterprise Pages Add tables within Pages Scribe now lets you add tables to Pages, so you can organize information in rows and columns and make your guide easier... February 6, 2026

item.title: Scribe - Improve your workflows with AI to work more efficiently
item.description: Scribe: Improve your workflows with AI to work more efficiently Use Scribe to analyze any of your workflows and suggest ways to improve it for speed and efficiency. From turning seven clicks into one, to... August 20, 2025

item.title: Scribe - Control when edits go live with publishing changes
item.description: Scribe: Enterprise Editing Control when edits go live with publishing changes Teams can now have more control over when updates to their Scribes become visible by keeping new edits separate from publicly visible content.... August 18, 2025

item.description: Scribe: Enterprise Viewing Sharing Bring Scribes into your AI workflows with the enterprise search API Scribe’s newest search API makes critical process knowledge easy to find, right where people work. Employees can surface trusted Scribe guides... August 12, 2025

Take a look under the hood and see what's new with the latest version of PaperCut MF, and find out what things we've fixed along the way. See what's new with the...

item.title: Slack - Slack 4.46.99
item.description: Slack: September 22, 2025 This release includes security improvements. Updating is recommended.

item.title: Slack - Slack 4.46.101
item.description: Slack: October 6, 2025 A little reminder as you go about your day: The world is a more unique place simply because you’re a part of it, and you’ve affected others in ways you can’t imagine. Oh, and no big changes to the app this time. Happy messaging!

item.title: Slack - Slack 4.46.104
item.description: Slack: October 21, 2025 All bugs that were fixed in this release were too small for the eye to see or too fiddly for human words to describe. Nevertheless, work was done, things tinkered with and the app became subtly better.

item.title: Slack - Slack 4.47.59
item.description: Slack: November 10, 2025 Bugs were squashed, performance was improved, work was done, and the result was good. Please enjoy Slack responsibly.

item.title: Slack - Slack 4.47.65
item.description: Slack: November 24, 2025 This release includes security improvements. Updating is recommended.

item.title: Slack - Slack 4.47.69
item.description: Slack: December 8, 2025 Don’t mind us — just making a few small adjustments to keep the app in tip-top shape. More to come soon. Cheerio!

item.title: Slack - Slack 4.47.72
item.description: Slack: December 12, 2025 This release includes minor security improvements. Updating is beneficial.

item.title: Slack - Slack 4.48.92
item.description: Slack: February 13, 2026 Hard work is happening this week, but nothing we can easily describe. It’s like a duck swimming on a pond. Under the water, the duck is paddling furiously, but on top all that can be seen is the gentle gliding of a bird on water. This week, Slack is the duck.

item.title: Slack - Slack 4.48.94
item.description: Slack: February 18, 2026 This release includes minor security improvements. Updating is beneficial.

item.title: Slack - Slack 4.48.95
item.description: Slack: February 19, 2026 We tidied the shelves, cleaned the windows and ran a white-gloved finger over every flat surface. Just a little routine maintenance to ensure that everything is shipshape. Full steam ahead!
